attributes.action: Call for National inquiry into grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: So the public and politicians understands the full extent of the corruption and ethnicity of grooming gangs.  Also so governments know which areas to focus on improving safety for children and brushing it under the carpet
attributes.background: To implement a 12 month time limited national inquiry into groomings

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
